_header: Alas woe shall mine heart slacken
_description: Mary’s lament at the Cross — one 8-line stanza

NLS18721.First Lines:
Allas wo sal myn herte slakenTo Jon i am to warde
                    taken…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…ffor wane of wele my wo is wakenwas neuere wif so
                    wo
